```{r}
library(stringr)
```


```{r}
course <- c("籃球","棒球","電視")
course
```

```{r}
str_subset(course,"球")
```
表示只把有經濟學三個字的表示出來
```{r}
str_detect(course,"球")
```

```{r}
studentID<-c(
  '410177115','410176080','410174233','410177011','410182045','410176014')
major <- str_sub(studentID,5,6)
major
year <- str_sub(studentID,2,4)
year
```
#5,6代表第五個到第六個
#2,4代表第二到第四個

```{r}
month <- c("3","4","6")
day <- c("11","5","7")
char1 <- c("月","月","月")
char2 <- c("日","日","日")
month
char1
day 
char2
str_c(month,char1,day,char2)
```
#c代表合併
```{r}
str_c(month,c("月"),day,c("日"))
str_c(month,"",day,"日")
```
```{r}
month
day
str_c(month,day, sep="月-")
```

```{r}
dates <- c("3-11", "4-5",  "2-7")
dates
str_split(dates,"-")
```
